title: Plants VS Zombies GOTY
description:
Get Plants VS Zombies Game Of The Year Edition for free instantly and play pre-installed SteamRiP
Zombies are invading your home, and the only defense is your arsenal of plants Armed with an alien nursery-worth of zombie -zapping plants like peashooters and cherry bombs, youâ€™ll need to think fast and plant faster to stop dozens of types of zombies dead in their tracks. Obstacles like a setting sun, creeping fog and a swimming pool add to the challenge, and with five game modes to dig into, the fun never dies.
And the best part is that as you progress through the levels , you will also develop. You will get access to new plants and weapons, you will be able to grow new types of plants, you will develop, pump damage and more, and in the end you can create a really cool army of sunflowers and more. Fun with Ragdolls: The Game

system_requirements.Graphics: 128MB of video memory, 16-bit or 32-bit color quality
